page.title: 20PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: THERE IS A ROUTE FROM LEICESTER TO GRANTHAM OPERATED BY LINCOLNSHIRE ROAD CAR COMPANY, NUMBER 618. BUSES LEAVE FOR GRANTHAM AT 9.44, 11.15, 3.15, 6.54 AND 7.15. BUSES LEAVE FOR LEICESTER AT 8.45, 12.45 AND 4.45. MON TO SAT. ON SUNDAYS THERE ARE TWO BUSES A DAY EACH WAY. SKINNERS OF SALTBY OPERATE A MON TO SATURDAY SERVICE TO GRANTHAM AT 8.20 AND DEPARTING FROM GRANTHAM AT 5.35. EXTRA BUSES ON SATURDAYS FROM CROXTON AT 9.25, 11.35, 1.25. ALL SERVICES LIKELY TO BE SEVERELY AMENDED OWING TO THE PROPOSED BUS BILL
